name: Progress-Keeper
desc: Track, transform and present change log entries.

changelog.desc: Renaming test classes after unintentionally adding fragment 'sample' to all test cases.
BREAKING CHANGE: Removed class ProgressKeeper and refactored methods of ProgressKeeperInterface.
BREAKING CHANGE: Field identifier (key) 'adnc' is replaced by 'audi' as an alias for 'audience'.

releases.remarks: Initial release: Provides a basic factory class methods allowing a json -> html transformation.

changelog.desc: Added methods for adding releases to change logs. Object model hierarchy is now: change log -> releases -> log entries
Added methods for adding log entries to releases.
Only mandatory log entry fields would be correctly set by parse-from-array method.
Clarified main goals of this project + some cosmetic changes.
Added classes representing log entries and releases.
Committing this project to the follow the principles of conventional-changelog and keep-a-changelog.
Very first sketch using a Reader/Presenter interface concept and a ProgressKeeperFactory.
